markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Ogmunzorius](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2506)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Dream](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=44)): DC 38

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 36

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 33
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 11">[Ogmunzorius](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2506)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Dream" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=299" />
<trait label="Incorporeal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=222" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #189: Dreamers of the Nameless Spires](/Sources.aspx?ID=195) pg. 16

**Perception** +21; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Varisian](/Languages.aspx?ID=44); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) 100 feet

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +22, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +21, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +21, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +23, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +22

<row gap="medium">
**Str** -5

**Dex** +5

**Con** +4

**Int** +4

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +6
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 28 

**Fort** +19 

**Ref** +21 

**Will** +22 

+1 status to all saves vs. [magic](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 145

</row>

**Immunities**
[cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27), [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), precision, [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=145)

**Resistances**
all 10 (except [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [force](/Traits.aspx?ID=75), [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297), or [negative](/Traits.aspx?ID=118); double resistance vs. non-[magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103))

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** fly 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
nightmare tendril +22 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 5d8 cold plus frozen nightmare

**Occult Innate Spells** DC 30
- **4th**
[Nightmare](/Spells.aspx?ID=208), [Sleep](/Spells.aspx?ID=288)
- **5th**
[Confusion](/Spells.aspx?ID=48), [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69) (at will)
- **6th**
[Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110), [Phantasmal Killer](/Spells.aspx?ID=219), [Teleport](/Spells.aspx?ID=338)

**Rituals** DC 30

- **6th**
[Planar Binding](/Rituals.aspx?ID=17)

**Frozen Nightmare**  ([Curse](/Traits.aspx?ID=38), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [Fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) Ogmunzorius's touch fills the victim's mind with realistic hallucinations and visions of being stranded alone and naked in an endless expanse of ice. The only point of reference in this vision when it manifests are strange dark spires looming impossibly tall on the horizon. **Saving Throw** DC 30 Fortitude; **Stage 1** [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15) (1 day); **Stage 2** fatigued and [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) (1 day); **Stage 3** The victim falls asleep and becomes covered in a rime of frost. They can't be awakened as long as they remain at this stage. A victim who perishes while at this stage frosts over completely, freezing solid into a block of ice. (1 day)

</column>
name: Ogmunzorius
primary_source: Pathfinder #189: Dreamers of the Nameless Spires
primary_source_raw: Pathfinder #189: Dreamers of the Nameless Spires pg. 16
resistance_markdown: all 10 (except [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [force](/Traits.aspx?ID=75), [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297), or [negative](/Traits.aspx?ID=118); double resistance vs. non-[magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103))
resistance_raw: all 10 (except  fire ,  force ,   ghost touch  , or  negative ; double resistance vs. non- magical )

The only point of reference in this vision when it manifests are strange dark spires looming impossibly tall on the horizon. Saving Throw DC 30 Fortitude; Stage 1 fatigued (1 day); Stage 2 fatigued and enfeebled 1 (1 day); Stage 3 The victim falls asleep and becomes covered in a rime of frost. They can't be awakened as long as they remain at this stage. A victim who perishes while at this stage frosts over completely, freezing solid into a block of ice. (1 day)
